20.title: Inception
20.summary: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

21.title: The Dark Knight
21.summary: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

22.title: Se7en
22.summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

23.title: The Matrix
23.summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
